resources.string: Sportivo is a mobile application that helps the individuals to partipate or create the sports events happening near them!!

Itâ€™s not easy to find people with similar interest near you. People struggle to find sportsmen or teams to play with and end up staying home. Physical activity is very important, and clubs and gyms are very expensive. This app will help people engage in healthy activities and explore their inner talents and also encourage others to pick a sport and compete in it with elites.
Q: Why is authentication being required?

A: Authentication supports our ongoing investment in sports programming for all of our platforms and is consistent with industry trends. Digital platforms require significant investment, and authentication allows us to capture the value of that investment.
